Patients who stop taking antibiotics when symptoms subside contribute to the evolution of drug-resistant strains, because an incomplete course of treatment spares the most _________ bacteria.
Blank (i)
(A) widespread
(B) immature
(C) robust
(D) benignant
(E) notorious
